contents.title: Written content
contents.details: Write guides, step-by-step tutorials, community documentation, AsyncAPI blog posts, and beyond.

contents.title: Video content
contents.details: Produce educational videos on YouTube and other platforms for AsyncAPI.

contents.title: Live streams
contents.details: Moderate or host live streams that demo the AsyncAPI ecosystem.

contents.title: Give talks
contents.details: Speak at meetups and conferences; we‚Äôll help with slides, abstract submissions, and travel budget.

contents.title: Interactive Learning
contents.details: Gamify educational content and create interactive learning paths for teaching AsyncAPI and event-driven architectures.

contents.title: Build real-life usecases example
contents.details: Develop real-life usecase project example using the AsyncaAPI specification

contents.title: AsyncAPI Contributions
contents.details: Collaborate with the AsyncAPI community via diverse contributions and improvements.

contents.title: Gather Use-Cases
contents.details: Collect data from existing AsyncAPI users and create use-case studies.

tokens.title: Travel
tokens.details: Ambassadors are provided free entry to AsyncAPI conferences.

tokens.title: Special Swags
tokens.details: Community members recognize you by gifting you exclusive AsyncAPI Ambassador swag.

tokens.title: Workshop Swags
tokens.details: Ambassadors are gifted swag from AsyncAPI conferences and workshops.
